title: Bronze plateskirt

properties.value: A bronze plateskirt is the weakest plateskirt in RuneScape. It has identical stat bonuses to the bronze platelegs but weighs less. A player with 16 Smithing can make it by using three bronze bars on an anvil while carrying a hammer, granting 37.5 smithing experience. They can be bought from Ranael's Super Skirt Store in Al Kharid.

Item ID1087

A bronze plateskirt is the weakest plateskirt in RuneScape. It has identical stat bonuses to the bronze platelegs but weighs less. A player with 16 Smithing can make it by using three bronze bars on an anvil while carrying a hammer, granting 37.5 smithing experience. They can be bought from Ranael's Super Skirt Store in Al Kharid.

 Attack bonuses

[[File:Bronze plateskirt detail.png|120px|left]]
A '''bronze plateskirt''' is the weakest [[plateskirt]] in ''RuneScape''. It has identical stat bonuses to the [[bronze platelegs]] but weighs less. A player with 16 [[Smithing]] can make it by using three [[bronze bar]]s on an [[anvil]] while carrying a [[hammer]], granting 37.5 smithing [[experience]]. They can be bought from [[Ranael's Super Skirt Store]] in [[Al Kharid]].
